STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION:
local forests = CountCardsSubtypeZonePlayer( LAND_TYPE_FOREST, ZONE_IN_PLAY, EffectController() )
if forests > 0 then local characteristics = Object():GetCurrentCharacteristics() characteristics:Power_Add( 1 ) characteristics:Toughness_Add( 1 ) end
